titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures of 2-[4-[(2-hydroxy-3-dodecyloxypropl)oxy]-2-hydroxphenyl]-4,6-bis(2,4-dimethylphenyl)-1,3,5-triazine and 2-[4-[(2-hydroxy-3-tridecyloxypropyl)oxy]-2-hydroxyphenyl]-4,6-bis(2,4-demethylphenyl)-1,3,5-triazine in propylene glycol monomethyl ether.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures of 2-[4-[(2-hydroxy-3-dodecyloxypropl)oxy]-2-hydroxphenyl]-4,6-bis(2,4-dimethylphenyl)-1,3,5-triazine and 2-[4-[(2-hydroxy-3-tridecyloxypropyl)oxy]-2-hydroxyphenyl]-4,6-bis(2,4-demethylphenyl)-1,3,5-triazine in propylene glycol monomethyl ether.
